snippet: Over the first half of January, box-office grosses dropped sharply from their high points in late December, which is traditionally the most lucrative time of the year for Broadway musicals.
abstract: Over the first half of January, box-office grosses dropped sharply from their high points in late December, which is traditionally the most lucrative time of the year for Broadway musicals.

headline.main: After Holidays, Broadway Box Office Slumps
headline.print_headline: Broadway Box Office Slumps After Holidays
